about_the_game:
Discover the adorable world of baby animals with this charming jigsaw puzzle game! Delight in the cuteness and playfulness of various baby animals as you piece together their heartwarming images.

Featuring a collection of captivating scenes, this jigsaw puzzle game showcases the irresistible charm of baby animals in their natural habitats. From fluffy kittens and playful puppies to cuddly pandas and mischievous monkeys, each puzzle presents a delightful challenge that will warm your heart.

Immerse yourself in the joy of solving puzzles as you carefully arrange the interlocking pieces to reveal the endearing faces and endearing antics of these baby animals. With different difficulty levels, you can choose puzzles that suit your expertise, making it enjoyable for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages.

As you progress through the game, unlock new puzzles featuring even more adorable baby animals. Explore a variety of environments, such as lush jungles, colorful meadows, and snowy landscapes, each showcasing the beauty and diversity of our planet's littlest inhabitants.

Whether you're a seasoned puzzle solver or a casual player looking for a relaxing pastime, this jigsaw puzzle game offers a delightful escape into the world of baby animals. Indulge in the therapeutic and satisfying experience of assembling these precious images while embracing the innocence and charm that only baby animals can bring.

With stunning artwork, intuitive controls, and a soothing soundtrack, this jigsaw puzzle game provides a captivating and immersive experience that celebrates the undeniable allure of baby animals. Get ready to embark on a heartwarming journey and let the adorable world of baby animals capture your imagination!

Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

- 3 difficulty settings: Up to 42 pieces!
- 16 puzzles
- Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time!
- 1080p HD Graphics.
- Traditional jigsaw puzzle that you can easily play
- More puzzles will increase with DLC

name: Jigsaw Puzzle - Baby Animals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
